messages.subject: Sunday - day 7
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah!!!  I completed my goal of seven days of Leslie tapes in a row.  I am very thankful to this list for giving me someone(s) to be accountable to.  I did the
messages.messageBody:
Yeah!!! I completed my goal of seven days of Leslie tapes in a row. I
am very thankful to this list for giving me someone(s) to be accountable
to. I did the two mile tape, 50 sit ups, and some yoga stretches today.
My legs were somewhat fatigued, but my hips are still feeling pretty
good. (not perfect, but definately better!)

My new goal is to complete a total of 21 days of Leslie Tapes, so that
means two weeks in my next goal. I read that it takes about that long
to form an exercise habit and that if you do it in the morning, you are
more likely to be successful. Unfortunately dh and I are on opposite
schedules these days. He stays up late and sleeps in and I get up early
and go to bed early. (Hey, maybe that's a good thing, being we are home
with each other 24/7 when he isn't out of town.)

Anyway, thanks to all of you for joining me in supporting each other in
our fitness goals.

Angela
